We are Nimira Tech

View Projects

We Specialise In

JavaScript Frameworks, Pen-testing and Deep Learning Neutral Networks

Coding

Coding is our passion. We specialise in React, Vue and Angular and technologies like Node, Go, Rust, Express, Fastify, Next JS, Django, MongoDB and Firebase, to name but a few.

Microservices

We are experts with Docker and Kubernetes to help manage microservices. The technologies we mostly use are Fastify, Koa, Moleculer and Derby JS.

Ethical Hacking

Our team of pen-testers are ready to help strengthen and enhance your Information Techology systems. We have experienced Red and Blue teams that will analysis and diagnose problems with your network.

Data Science

We're developing our strength with regards to Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Artifical Intelligence. We're working on our own AI model using various Neural Network Technics.
